document.full_text: united states district court judge reggie b. walton said he did not think that roger clemens or his former trainer had clearly violated the judge's instructions by speaking publicly about clemens's pending perjury trial.
document.title: clemens and accuser scolded for interviews
lines_and_colors: united states district court judge reggie b. walton said he did not think that roger clemens or his former trainer had clearly violated the judge's instructions by speaking publicly about clemens's pending perjury trial.
